ygData.subject: Re: Memmed spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey people... Can we have a civil discussion here?  I dont want to see everyone get slammed here.  We all play the same class and some people fight different
ygData.messageBody:
Hey people... Can we have a civil discussion here? I dont want to see
everyone get slammed here. We all play the same class and some people fight
different then other people. Depending on what server/race/friends you are
with. Lets keep it clean :P

Qanin
16th circle
The Rathe

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeff [mailto:jeffh@...]
Sent: Friday, June 25, 1999 9:58 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Memmed spells


From: "Jeff" <jeffh@...>

> This has got to be the most idiotic statement I have ever heard.
> "Divine ain't that good" pff.. I'd like to see you root 3 festering
> hangs and gate out alive. You'll NEVER do it. However.. one divine
> aura and you've escaped all of them without the least bit of
> difficulty.
>

Is attacking the guy for stating his opinion really necessary? I mean
lighten up.

Perhaps the situations he gets involoved in, are mainly single oponents,
with slower attacks, and hence gate is a better option. If those 3
festering hags you were talking about were away from a zone border, you
probably still wouldnt make it out alive. Even with Divine.
